components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay To VEI Network In Italy

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to VEI Network In Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to VEI Network In Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Golis Network in Somalia

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Golis network in Somalia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 June 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 13 June 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting an emergency maintenance from 14 June 2023 at 00:00 PDT until 14 June 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of Short code and Long codes.
Germany
United Kingdom
Mexico
Spain

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 June 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 15 June 2023 at 09:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Telekom customers.
Impacted Products: SNA, Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 18 June 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from Verizon US handsets when sending via US shortcode

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
19 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 20 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT
27 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 28 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT
05 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT

Our Carrier Partner Telus CA is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 04 July 2023 at 04:00 PDT. 07 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 08 June 2023 at 04:00 PDT
14 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 15 June 2023 at 04:00 PDT
